newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Siu-Fung Ceramics postpones rights issue.
newsitem.headline: Siu-Fung Ceramics postpones rights issue.

text.p: Siu-Fung Ceramics Holdings Ltd said on Thursday it would postpone a proposed HK$400 million rights issue for about one month and expected to send out the prospectus on November 18 instead of October 17.
The company said in a statement it had begun talks regarding the disposal of certain assets and subsidiaries and the rearrangement of certain bank borrowings.
Siu-Fung said on September 27 it intended to raise about HK$400 million after expenses through a two-for-five rights issue at HK$0.70 per rights share.
The proceeds would be used to repay debt and serve as additional funding for the company's further expansion.
Trading in Siu-fung's shares was expected to resume on Thursday. It was suspended on Tuesday pending an announcement.
